title: Dark Souls: Redemption
description:
Description :
        Dark Souls Redemption ~ A Son's Curse, a Mother's Destiny ~ A son's curse, a mother's destiny. The dying ashes of a campfire light up a devastated world. A woman, brought back to life by a mysterious mark, emerges from a deep sleep with no memory of her past. In this unrecognizable universe, she is pursued relentlessly by the dreaded Guild of Scale Guardians. However, she is offered unexpected salvation by an imposing individual who fiercely guards the secret of his own past Be prepared to face the lonely souls and embrace the darkness once more, in this original, never-before-seen Dark Souls story.
